H0.text: In the human body, which bone connects the humerus with the calvicle. Clavicle

H1.text: In the human body, which bone connects the humerus with the calvicle. Sternum

H2.text: In the human body, which bone connects the humerus with the calvicle. Ribcage

H3.text: In the human body, which bone connects the humerus with the calvicle. Scapula (shoulder blade)

A4.text: The scapula (pl. : scapulae or scapulas), also known as the shoulder blade, is the bone that connects the humerus (upper arm bone) with the clavicle (collar bone).
